title: Mini Shopify
desc: Super simple application where users can signup to be merchants, setup stores, and sell products. As well as purchase products made by other merchants. The purchase itself will obviously be simulated, but purchases cannot exceed the inventory.

title: Valorant Strategic Planner
desc: Plan strategies for Valorant by placing Agents on the field, dragging them to different positions, and drawing out the planned move, smokes, and walls.

title: Robotic Guitar Player (RGP)
desc: This is a group project consisting of 5 teammembers. The RGP allows the user to enter a song and play it, or can allow user to enter an external guitar to play along according to a specific genre.

title: NxN 2048 Game
desc: This is a quick project, and I had lots of fun with it. I figured the array sliding algorithm would be a fun challenge to kill my boredom.

title: Mj/Mn Chord Classifier
desc: An experiment to see if a sampled sound is a single note, a major chord, or a minor chord. Using a multi-class CNN model, and generated chord and note sounds.

title: C++ Sudoku Solver Experiment
desc: An experiment to compare brute force and stochastic implementation of a Sudoku solver. You can find the results in the source below. 'Complete' with Unit Tests

title: K Nearest Neighbour Analyzer
desc: Framework to visualize, test, and predict a k Nearest Nighbours model. Built a UI to load feature vectors and labels. Optionally can create a brand new feature vector, and load labels.
